titleStmt.title: A letter sent by Sir Iohn Suckling from France, deploring his sad estate and flight: vvith a discoverie of the plot and conspiracie, intended by him and his adherents against England.
titleStmt.author: I. S. K.
Mennes, John, Sir, 1599-1671.
Norris, William, b. 1619?

notesStmt.note: A ballad satirizing Suckling and Sir William Davenant ; ascribed to Sir John Mennes and to William Norris.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
